descript.abstract: Boundaries of Uganda's 80 Districts as of 2006.

idinfo.useconst: Dataset is not for use in litigation. idinfo.datacred: UGANDA BUREAU OF STATISTICS (UBOS). 2006. Uganda Administrative Boundaries GIS Database. Kampala, Uganda: Government of Uganda, UBOS.
